name: Angela OBrien
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can refer professional clients needing consulting or business development services. Limited profile data suggests openness to cross-referral arrangements with professionals in aligned business service areas.
what_you_do: Founder and co-owner of Esteem Lingerie and the Esteem Bra Fitting Academy, providing business coaching, consulting, and bra fitter training for the lingerie industry.
who_you_serve: Lingerie shop owners and staff seeking specialized bra fitting training, business coaching, and operational improvement.
signature_programs: Esteem Bra Fitting Academy, free masterclass on building resilience and preparing for unforeseen challenges
service_provided: Bra fitter training programs, business coaching, business consulting, masterclasses, staff training, strategic planning, process alignment
business_focus: Training and coaching lingerie businesses in bra fitting, operations, growth, staff training, and strategic planning.
offering: Business coaching and consulting specializing in lingerie retail, bra fitter training programs, and masterclasses on building business resilience.
bio: Angela O'Brien is the founder and co-owner of Esteem Lingerie and the Esteem Bra Fitting Academy in West Kelowna, British Columbia, Canada. She is a Certified Business Coach and Consultant with 25 years of experience, including over 19 years in the luxury lingerie industry. Her background includes a decade in the corporate insurance industry where she developed skills in business development and coaching.
